name: Moonshine and Sunlight
description:
In a world where light and dark are two halves of a whole and the denizens are stuck on the wrong sides, a Hero comes to  save them! Solve this celestial puzzle game and learn more about them as you continue!

Programmer: Seth Brock

Puzzle Designer: Seth Brock

Character Designer: Sam Smith

Cinematic Art: Sam Smith Writer: Seth Brock

A Global Game Jam game by Seth Brock and Sam Smith

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/moonshine-and-sunlight-4
